Exploring Energies

by Pascal Mickelson

Welcome to Exploring Energies

Posted on February 14th, 2012 by Pascal Mickelson

This blog exists for me to think through transitioning to alternate energy and to share this process with you. While I am a trained scientist, I am not an expert in energy matters. I started this blog to encourage myself to share what I learn as I explore an area which I would like to understand better. I will try to support everything I say through the scientific literature or published reports even though I am largely targeting material at a lay person's level.

      I am a post-doctoral researcher in experimental quantum optics at the University of Arizona.
